roleset.name: to provide with additional fuel

example.name: transitive
example.text: [Mr. Carpenter]-1 this month sold off Kidder 's eight brokerage offices in Florida and Puerto Rico to Merrill Lynch & Co. , [*-1] refueling speculation that Kidder is getting out of the brokerage business entirely .
example.arg: speculation that Kidder is getting out of the brokerage business entirely

roleset.note: Frames file for 'refuel' based on WSJ; nominal 'refueling' based on BOLT-6. Relation to 'fuel.01'.

example.name: nominal rel: refueling
example.text: Also they will deploy US strategic bombers and aerial refueling aircraft there .
